message: This is where Liberalism, and the subsequent desire for a nanny state, fails. It is not the government's job to babysit us. We have our own liberty in this nation, at least for now, and we are to exercise it. It is indeed unfortunate that mental illness played a factor here, but unless someone reaches out for help, or a family member were to commit her for evaluation, there is not really much the city could (or should) do.
Hope you guys washed the studio down will bleach after that Moore-on left. Why waste the time even talking to him, he is a lunatic.
I agree, I have always said this about all demonstrations and riots. Also think that without Media glorification we wouldn't have all the mass killings.

Obamacare has raised the numbers of jobs. Why, I say this, is because now people have to get two jobs to survive because every place is only offering part time work in fear of being made to provide health insurance.

Other questions people should ask are """"How much will your electric bill go up?"""", """"How long does its battery last?"""", """"What's the price to replace the battery?"""", """"What happens to the discarded batteries?"""". My niece bought a hybrid plug in and the electric bill went up $76 a month on average.

You can't argue with stupid people, they will drag you down to their level and then beat you with experience. These people actually believe that there is a god. And that their chosen God is the correct one out of hundreds described. Funny how they were all 'discovered' before we learnt how to use science to our advantage. Please, all the non-stupid people, save your breath.... Enjoy the beautiful whale x

@ ...You don't know the difference between work and home. No company should owe you any such thing. Places to pump and fridges to store your milk...yes, right! LMAO! Go buy a cooler or better yet, pump at home or on YOUR time and get the hell over yourselves or stay the hell home altogether and take care of your crap. Work is work and not a place to take care of this kind of nonsense. You and people just like you are ruining this country with your idiotic demands and entitled attitudes.
